name: Primarch Overclock
description: Divine cogs spin faster than mortal sight can follow. (Self: tempBuff ATK+2 for 3 turns / Other: tempDebuff DEF-1 for 3 turns)

name: Forgehammer Strike
description: One blow to shatter steel and bone alike. (Self: battle / Other: battle)

name: Steam Vent Blast
description: Superheated vents scald the enemy. (Self: battle / Other: RES -1)

name: Gearhold Salvage
description: Recovered scrap turned into fortune. (Self: loot / Other: DEF -1)

name: Mechplate Reinforcement
description: Layer upon layer of forged protection. (Self: HP +1 / Other: tempDebuff ATK-1 for 3 turns)

name: Runesteel Infusion
description: Arcane sigils enhance the frame. (Self: DEF +1 / Other: loot)

name: Pressure Spike
description: Pipes hiss before releasing a deadly burst. (Self: battle / Other: tempDebuff DEF-2 for 2 turns)

name: Exo-Servos
description: Servomotors add might to every swing. (Self: tempBuff ATK+1 for 3 turns / Other: RES -1)

name: Blast Furnace Barrage
description: Molten metal rains upon the foe. (Self: battle / Other: battle)

name: Wrenchmaster's Gambit
description: A quick fix that turns the tide. (Self: PSY +1 / Other: loot)

name: Mag-Clamp Grapple
description: No escape from the iron grip. (Self: HP +1 / Other: tempDebuff ATK-2 for 2 turns)

name: Runegear Overload
description: Push the runes past safe limits. (Self: tempBuff ATK+3 for 3 turns / Other: DEF -1)

name: Ironbeard's Edict
description: A command backed by centuries of craft. (Self: RES +1 / Other: battle)

name: Alloyed Faith
description: Faith and steel intertwined. (Self: HP +1 / Other: loot)

name: Cogwheel Blitz
description: A barrage of spinning steel. (Self: battle / Other: RES -1)

name: Pressure-Sealed Armor
description: Perfectly fitted for survival in any depth. (Self: tempBuff DEF+1 for 3 turns / Other: tempDebuff ATK-1 for 3 turns)

name: Gyroblade Charge
description: Momentum and machinery unite. (Self: battle / Other: battle)

name: Ore Purity Ritual
description: Refined to perfection. (Self: DEF +1 / Other: DEF -1)

name: Steam-Powered Rampage
description: Unstoppable force driven by boiling fury. (Self: tempBuff ATK+1, DEF+1 for 3 turns / Other: RES -1)

name: Foundry's Fortune
description: The heart of the forge yields unexpected bounty. (Self: loot / Other: tempDebuff ATK-1 for 3 turns)
